profile_positions.description:
- Responsible for providing financial analysis and insight in the performance of Elsevier's Research
Business Unit "STM Journals" (STMJ), representing over $2b worth of revenue and coordinating monthly reporting and forecasting cycles within BU.
- Accountable for the delivery of key management reports, forecasts and Latest Views to Senior Management Team, ensuring the requirements and deadlines are met on time.
- Supporting and driving the global setup of the Centre of Expertise Operating model, e.g. effective forecasting tools for sales and revenue, standardization of reporting and processes across Elsevier, and as well as collaborating on projects to automate and streamline reporting capabilities within Sales Finance BI tools (Sales Data Warehouse, Planning Budgeting & Forecasting).
profile_positions.title: Senior Business Controller - Sales & Revenue

profile_positions.description:
-Responsible for providing visibility on performance metrics and profitability, through the management of the monthly reporting process and ownership of the budgeting, planning and control cycle. Supporting the decision-making process and challenging the business with relevant and to the point information by the set-up of automated reports, dashboards and tooling. One of the key challenges is to step forward the organization to a more professional way of working and drive the business to its full potential.

- As result of a new leadership on board seeking to fulfill the new business strategy, this role was added having as main challenge to roll out the function in line with the growth plan. In this manner, I have streamlined ways of working and implemented best practices such as budget holder, cost centers, bottom-up budgeting, customer lifetime value and marketing spend effectiveness. Besides, I have built from scratch, reports and dashboards meant to revise and provide insights in the key performance drivers to the commercial and operations team in order to understand deviations and steer the business.
profile_positions.title: Business Controller

profile_positions.description:
- Acting as sparring partner and financial expert for all matters relating to end-to-end Supply Chain for in cluster (2 factories, 50 distribution centers, 6 countries). Being the trusted adviser and provide support and challenge to the management team in the delivery of financial performance and development to ensure the integrity of processes, reported and planned numbers and guardianship of the business.

- As a new role created, I strengthened the monitoring via the introduction of new performance metrics, automated reports and ad hoc dashboards in order to highlight trends, analyze causes of variance and implement corrective plans, acting as a complete owner of the financial cycle. Besides, I contributed constantly to set and standardize processes and governances through continuous liaison with internal/external stakeholders which led to savings within the operation
profile_positions.title: Finance Business Partner - Operations

profile_positions.description:
- Responsible of revenue management for Argentina & Peru, and the consequent budgeting, forecasting and reporting cycle, followed by in detail analysis and interpretation of business performance, with focus in pricing, volume, and mix versus plan. At the same time, support and strengthen the strategic pricing decision by the means of scenario modelling and impact assessment (price sensitivity, macroeconomics, demographics, market trends). In addition, owner of the entire pricing process across the organization, ensuring correct communication and implementation at all functional levels. Last but not least, assessment and advice of initiatives driven by Commercial team through the set up of business cases, financial scenarios and analysis of competitor metrics.

- Successful management of unforeseen business cycles in order to mitigate the impact on the profitability and maximize revenues. Consequently, working closely with internal stakeholders, I managed to build a high trust to address and meet the company goals at deadlines established.
